OOC: Could somebody take Symphony back?  He's in stasis lock so I can't rea=
lly do anything with him.

::Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/Bodicons/Quat=
ro/Orchestra::

  Skullgrin was happy that Megatron won.

   "I swear loyal=
ty to you Megatron!" Skullgrin said.

   "Ya, what he said," Triggerhappy s=
aid, standing in the background.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~
      Decapitron and the other Bodicons were honored to finally meet Mega=
tron, who they had heard so much about in Decepticon history as well as Gal=
vatron.

      "Megatron, me and my Bodicons promise to serve you without q=
uestion," Decapitron pledged. 

      The Bodicons just nodded.
~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Cutthroat stopped firing at Motormast=
er and Megatron.

     "Megatron win battle!  Megatron leader!  Cool..." Cu=
tthroat cheered.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
OOC:Okay, I se=
nt this before, but I am just sending the last part of this post, to make s=
ure Yan posts with Iron Raptor to reply to it.

IC: Quatro opened a special=
 communications link with Iron Raptor.(He doesn't need no special wrist dev=
ice or anything, he has a special device planted inside of him, so he can t=
alk like normal except over long distances and when he is engaged in a long=
 distance conversation his eyes glow blue instead of green)

           "Ir=
on Raptor, leader of the Maximals, I am universal bounty hunter Quatro, and=
 I came to Earth to kill Hell Beast and Megatron.  I was thinking that I co=
uld side with you for a while, and we may be able to help eachother," Quatr=
o said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Orchestra grinned,=
 then drew her closer to him and started a deep kiss.
